
``get_cross_section_coordinates``
=====================================

get_cross_section_coordinates

Description
-----------

get local coordinates within cross section plane

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   get_cross_section_coordinates(cell_subset_projection_locations)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``cell_subset_projection_locations``
     - cell_subset_projection_locations
